name: Why did the Elephant Cross the road?
name_original: Why did the Elephant Cross the road?
description:
﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌

A 2.5D, 3rd person frogger inspired game where you are playing as different animals within the world to see what would their perspectives be like if you needed to cross a busy road/river to get to the other side.

Do you think you will be able to make it without dying on your first attempt?

﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌

How to play: Download Elephant Game, extract the files and run BlockGame.exe

﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌University of Utah GameCraft Jams Submission 3/31/23 - 4/2/23
Theme: Redo

Developers

MJ - 3D Artist/Level Designer
Hunter - Programmer/Level Designer
Bria - 2D Artist/Sound Designer
